description:
What our students are saying...

"As a hip hop artist, I learned a ton from this course. You can't just rely on your talent to get yourself out there... you have to do the work to get people to know about you! This course teaches you strategies both online/offline, which are easy to follow. I highly recommend this course to any artists who are looking to grow their fan base." -NH

"Some of the great lessons by real life singer. These type of courses really help new comers who want to be distinguished in music industry. mostly music academies are ripping off for these lessons but this course is affordable and giving much information in this area" - NT

What are you doing to get your music and name 'out there'?

Do you have an upcoming album or music video release and want to make the most of it?

Do you want to grow your fan base and attract more opportunities for your music career?

You could pay an agency hundreds or thousands of dollars to help you with these things (lets be honest - IF you find one that doesn't try to snake you...)

Or you could do it yourself for way way less.

This course is designed to be an all inclusive guide on how to promote your music online AND offline. We'll continuously be adding more lecture videos on different music marketing topics, so the value in this course is ever expanding.

Think of it as your go-to hub for music promotion. If you want to build your Facebook presence, you can watch the videos on that and take action. If you need tips for music marketing at your upcoming show, you can watch the videos on that and prepare what you need.

All from 3 different instructors who bring their expertise in music promotion, branding, social media marketing and sales.

Let's de-mystify music marketing.

Here are just a few things you will learn:

  • How to set up your fan mailing list and continue to grow it with online and offline marketing strategies
  • What marketing tools you need to make the most out of every performance and capture more fans
  • Hacks for saving $$ on your business cards and music drop cards
  • Highly effective strategy using Facebook events when launching a new song, album or music video

By the end of this course, you will have an online presence, a fan email list and a set of physical marketing materials for upcoming shows.

If you ever get stuck, you have access to our discussion group and a free 30min 1-on-1 Skype session if you complete the entire course. You will get a personal evaluation of your current social media presence with tips for improvement, and you will gain clarity on what you need to focus on (from a marketing standpoint) to take your music career to the next level.

You've spent all this time crafting your sound, and it's about time more people hear it!

If you're not happy with the course, I will refund your money within 30 days, no questions asked - it's my personal guarantee to you!

You have nothing to lose. Click on the "Take This Course" button and we'll see you inside!
title: DIY Musician Guide: How to Promote Your Music + Sell To Fans
instructors: Sergey Kasimov, Jewel Tolentino & Auret Esselen
